page.title: 11Law and Order-Hackenthorpe
page.content: The area is under the control of Hackenthorpe Police Station.Generally this is a quiet area with very few crimes.The most frequent calls on the police are for traffic accidents especially on Birley Moor Road which is a notorious blackspot for pedestrian accidents.Radar guns have been used on here and White Lane to detect speeding motorists.The most frequent crimes are teenage crimes:e.g.Inter-school rivalry leading to fights; thefts-of and from cars and motorbikes; burglary, especially near Christmas. There is only one small police station in Gleadless,but it is not always manned.Every police station in the area is connected to the early warning system in the event of a nuclear attack.
